sub_topic: Identifying the perfect matching in a graph.
message_1:
Consider the following graph:

$\qquad\qquad\qquad\qquad$ 

Identify if the graph has a perfect matching. If yes, list out all the perfect matchings available for the given graph. If no, explain why.
message_2: Unfortunately, I cannot see the graph you are referring to. Please provide a description of the graph or the adjacency matrix, and I will be happy to help you determine if it has a perfect matching and list them if available.
